description: |
  Welcome to the Department of Mathematical Sciences at Faculty of Computer and Mathematical Sciences, UiTM Kedah Branch Campus. We offers servicing courses in Mathematics and Statistics to all the faculties at UiTM Kedah. We started with  Department of Quantitative Sciences and in 2007 it has gone through a rebranding process and is now called Department of Mathematical Sciences. Currently, the Department of Mathematical Sciences consists of 17 lecturers (7 Mathematics, 9 Statistics and 1 Physics).
